alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 6:40PM EDT until June 26 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cayuga County in central New York... West central Onondaga County in central New York... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 638 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Union Springs, or near Auburn, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. This storm has a history of producing wind damage with multiple reports of trees down. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Auburn, Owasco, Sennett, Fleming, Skaneateles, Marcellus, Jordan, Port Byron, Union Springs and Elbridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
